solution_line_template: The total amount of children that went on both days is {children_monday} + {children_tuesday} = <<{children_monday}+{children_tuesday}={total_children}>>{total_children}.
The cost of the children's tickets is {total_children} × ${child_ticket_cost} = $<<{total_children}*{child_ticket_cost}={cost_children_tickets}>>{cost_children_tickets}.
The total amount of adults that went on both days is {adults_monday} + {adults_tuesday} = <<{adults_monday}+{adults_tuesday}={total_adults}>>{total_adults}.
The cost of the adults' tickets is {total_adults} × ${adult_ticket_cost} = $<<{total_adults}*{adult_ticket_cost}={cost_adult_tickets}>>{cost_adult_tickets}.
